thread.title: Kidderminster theatre group to put on Copacabana
thread.title_full: Kidderminster theatre group to put on Copacabana

title: Kidderminster theatre group to put on Copacabana
text:
The Carpet Trades Musical Theatre Company performs an annual musical at the theatre and this year they are staging the glitzy show based on Barry Manilow’s Copacabana, which brings the Grammy Award-winning song to life. What's the best musical you've seen this year? Let us know in the comments below 
After starting life as a movie made for television, the show became a hit in London’s West End and enjoyed numerous UK tours. 
The colourful show will run from October 15 to 24 and will include two matinees. What do you think?
